details:
noun
- a theatrical performer
= synonyms: thespian
- someone who plays a musical instrument as a profession
= example: someone who plays a musical instrument as a profession
= synonyms: musician, instrumentalist
- a person who participates in or is skilled at some game
= synonyms: participant
- an important participant, as in a business deal
= example: an important participant, as in a business deal
- a person who pursues a number of different social and sexual partners simultaneously
